# playgroundDescription

**Instance Property**

A description of the gazetteer settings shown in a playground.

## Declaration

```swift
var playgroundDescription: Any { get }
```

## Describing parameters

- **description**: A text representation of the gazetteer settings.
- **debugDescription**: A text representation of the gazetteer settings that’s suitable for output during debugging.
